title: Ep. 375 - Another School Board Abolishes Privacy In The Girls Locker Room
description:
Today we'll take a look at the reaction of various gay rights groups to Chick fil A's surrender. It proves again why surrender never pays off. Also, a school board in Illinois voted to allow boys in the girl's locker room. A very upsetting video of one girl at the school reacting to the vote should put the debate to rest. And we'll take a look at the creepiest Sprite ad you've ever seen. Date: 11-20-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
